abstract: Family of Israeli soldier Gilad Shalit spearheaded five-year campaign to lobby for their son’s release, helping to build overwhelming support in Israel for prisoner-exchange deal with Hamas.
snippet: The family of Gilad Shalit spearheaded a five-year campaign to lobby for their son’s release, helping to build overwhelming support in Israel for a deal with Hamas.
lead_paragraph: The family of Gilad Shalit spearheaded a five-year campaign to lobby for their son’s release, helping to build overwhelming support in Israel for a deal with Hamas.

headline.main: Soldier’s Family Led Campaign for His Release
headline.print_headline: Soldier’s Family Led Campaign For His Release
headline.seo: Shalit’s Release Came After Family’s 5-Year Campaign
